FOR FREAK SAKE (do I sound as stupid when I say that
as I think I do) CAN MUTATE GET SOME HELP! ICE OR THE
COUNCIL WHICHEVER WILL GET HIM TO ACCEPT DAMAGE!

--- CYBERWOLF4 <cyberwolf4@...> wrote:
> OK, thanks, I must've missed the retreat.
> 
> Ice filled with pride over her victory. Lunarpine
> had always told her that she had the passion to
> become a strong warrior. Her headache died as she
> ceased useing her mental abilities helping her see
> straight. The mutant looked around the battlefield
> for another target. The battle was far from over and
> even though Prowl had come forward to take command
> she still fealt the need to apear to be a strong
> leader. The mutant owl flew toward the ground trying
> to regain her composure when the Earth below began
> to spin sending Ice into an instant state of
> virtigo. She blinked and shook her head trying to
> shake off the feeling of dizzyness. Unsuccessfull
> the owl plumetet into a tailspin causing her speed
> to increase. She tried to transform but her mind was
> to jumbled by the effort to think straight. With a
> hard crash she "landed" on her head and blacked out.
> Her internal systems would eventually heal her but
> until they did she'd remain in a deep sleep.
>   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   From: Michael Coburn 
>   To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
>   Sent: Friday, November 02, 2001 8:44 PM
>   Subject: Re: Another female loseing her mind.
> 
> 
>   OOC:  My last post for Surgital was having him
> leave and head back to the Decepticon base...
>     ----- Original Message ----- 
>     From: CYBERWOLF4 
>     To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
>     Sent: Friday, November 02, 2001 9:13 AM
>     Subject: Re: Another female loseing her mind.
> 
> 
>     OOC:  My 
>        This is the last post I can find for the mind
> battle. I'm not sure if I responded or not so I'll
> play it from here.
> 
>        
>       Surgital tried to fight Ice's mind lock on
> his.  He was down on his knees, which made small
> craters in the ground, and holding his fists, trying
> to shake it off.  
> 
>       Ice fealt satisfaction in her latest
> acomplishment. It wasn't every day a single bot
> forces a gestault to it's knees. mentally she tried
> to reach out to any Maximal that could hear her
> thoughts. The mutant forced herself through the pain
> and tried to direct the order to attack while the
> giant was down. When this battle was over she knew
> she'd need either an asprin or a labotamy to stop
> the pain.
>         ----- Original Message ----- 
>         From: CYBERWOLF4 
>         To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
>         Sent: Friday, October 12, 2001 12:57 PM
>         Subject: Another female loseing her mind.
> 
> 
>         Surgitals flashback was sent into Ices mind,
> she saw everything as if it was happening to her.
> "It's not happening to me, it's not me." she kept
> telling herself as blade after blade struck her
> mental form. Trying desperately to control her
> thoughts she shouted another command. "SEPERATE"
>          
>         Her owl form spun out of control as she hit
> the ground. Seeing that form cut and beaten she
> transformed to her mutant robot mode. Her bearlike
> paws covered her head as a migrane began to form.
> She tried to be the good leader but her sanity would
> soon fade if her mind didn't leave Surgital. 
>           ----- Original Message ----- 
>           From: Samir Duran 
>           To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
>           Sent: Tuesday, October 09, 2001 4:15 PM
>           Subject: The Cybers Will Never Rule since
> Tankor sucks when it comes to spelling and using
> capitals
> 
> 
>          
> ::Triggerhappy/Skullgrin/Jume/Whee/Surgital::
>            
>           Triggerhappy's finger moved to pull the
> trigger.  Hell Drak's eyes were closed tight,
> waiting for death.  But nothing happened.  She
> opened her eyes.  Triggerhappy was hit, and fell to
> his knees, mouth wide open, shocked, and in pain.  
>            
>           "You....." Triggerhappy stopped to gasped
> for air, "Pile of......."
>            
>           Triggerhappy fell down on his face, so he
> was laying on the ground.  Where his face was, a
> puddle of mechfluid appeared, and mechfluids started
> spilling from where he had been hit.  The punctures
> in his metal started to turn into cracks, and
> mechfluid came out.
>            
>           Skullgrin, Jume, and Whee watched as
> Triggerhappy had been supposedly defeated.
>            
>           "NO!  MY DECEPTIPAL!" Skullgrin shouted.
>            
>           Skullgrin transformed into Pretender mode,
> and had his massive, freaky club.  He ran at
> AzureBlade and threw a lethal blow to AzureBlade's
> head.  Jume and Whee fired at AzureBlade.
>            
>           "No!  Watch out!" Hell Drak yelled.
>            
>           A light came into her optics, and then she
> quickly got up and dove at AzureBlade, trying to
> take him down, but out of the way of damage...
>           ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
>           Surgital suddenly felt something from Ice.
>  The mind thing.  Pain.  
>            
>           "No........not this.......I thought I had
> forgot about this!" Surgital said, but which Bodicon
> was saying it, nobody knew.
>            
>           Surgital didn't feel physical pain, but a
> flashback showed up, and would be visible in the
> minds of both Ice and all the Bodicons.  It was a
> flashback from Decapitron!  
>            
>           Flashback:  Decapitron was tied to a
> conveyer belt, with some sort of energon rope.  He
> was horrified, and was screaming for help.  Then, he
> went forward, and a bunch of saws and stuff came
> down!  They started cutting at Decapitron.  All he
> could do was scream in sheer pain.  Each saw blade
> had the Autobot symbol engraved on it.  Decapitron,
> still tied onto the conveyer belt, was now heading
> into a large box thing.  On the way, a heavy thing
> with an Autobot symbol came down and sort of crushed
> Decapitron's head.  Then, Decapitron went into the
> box thing, which also had an Autobot symbol, and
> then the doors of the box shut, and then Decapitron
> was stuck, and he was getting beaten and battered. 
> After the 10 minute torture process was done in the
> box, Decapitron kept going.  Mechfluid and oil and
> stuff were pouring like mad, and he was mangled and
> dislocated and stuff.  Finally, he was at the end,
> and was dumped off of the conveyer belt and onto the
> ground.  The last thing he had seen back then when
> that happened, was Autobots around him, laughing
> sinisterly with evil eyes and faces.  
>           *Flashback Ends*
>            
>           Surgital was still...
>
